columns.technician_id: The unique identifier for each technician assigned to repairs.
columns.repair_ID: The unique identifier for each specific repair task.
columns.Machine_ID: The unique identifier for each machine undergoing repair.

repair_assignment.table_description: The table links technicians to their assigned repair tasks for specific machines.

columns.technician_id: The unique identifier for each technician in the system.
columns.Name: The full name of the technician.
columns.Team: The team designation of the technician.
columns.Starting_Year: The year the technician started working.
columns.Age: The age of the technician in years.

technician.table_description: The table holds details of technicians available for repair assignments.

columns.repair_ID: The unique identifier for each repair entry in the system.
columns.name: The name assigned to the specific repair task.
columns.Launch_Date: The date when the repair task was initiated.
columns.Notes: The remarks or observations related to the repair task.

repair.table_description: The table catalogs repair tasks along with their details and notes.

columns.Machine_ID: The unique identifier for each machine in the database.
columns.Making_Year: The year the machine was manufactured.
columns.Class: The classification category of the machine.
columns.Team: The team associated with the machine's development.
columns.Machine_series: The series designation of the machine model.
columns.value_points: The numerical value score indicating machine performance.
columns.quality_rank: The ranking score assessing the machine's quality.

machine.table_description: The table stores details of machines including specifications and rankings.
